name: bsl-type-safety-analyzer
description: BSL Type Safety Analyzer with automated VSCode extension rebuilding

scripts.rebuild:quick: npm run build:rust && npm run copy:binaries && npm run build:extension
scripts.rebuild:dev: npm run build:rust:dev && npm run copy:binaries:dev && npm run build:extension
scripts.rebuild:fast: npm run build:rust:fast && npm run copy:binaries:dev && npm run build:extension

scripts.copy:binaries:all: node -e "const {execSync} = require('child_process'); const cmd = process.platform === 'win32' ? 'copy target\\dev-fast\\*.exe vscode-extension\\bin\\' : 'cp target/dev-fast/*.exe vscode-extension/bin/'; try { execSync(cmd, {stdio: 'inherit'}); } catch(e) { console.log('Copy completed with warnings'); }"
scripts.publish:marketplace: npm run build:release && cd vscode-extension && npx @vscode/vsce publish
scripts.publish:github: npm run git:release minor && git push origin main --follow-tags
